resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/BAO CAO PHAN TICH GIA THANH MANUAL')]

preCopyScript.value:
IF OBJECT_ID('@{item().TARGET_SCHEMA}.@{item().TARGET_TABLE}') IS NOT NULL
    TRUNCATE TABLE @{item().TARGET_SCHEMA}.@{item().TARGET_TABLE}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
if  day(dateadd(hour,7,getdate())) >= @{pipeline().parameters.FROM_DATE_PREVIOUS_MONTH} and day(dateadd(hour,7,getdate())) <= @{pipeline().parameters.TO_DATE_PREVIOUS_MONTH}
begin 
select
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(day,1,eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1)), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) FROM_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE())), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) TO_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) [CURRENT_DATE],
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()), 'yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) [YEAR],
cast(cast(FORMAT(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()), 'MM') as int) as nvarchar(12)) [MONTH]

union all
select
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(day,1,eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-2)), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) FROM_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) TO_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) [CURRENT_DATE],
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1), 'yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) [YEAR],
cast(cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1), 'MM') as int )as nvarchar(12)) [MONTH]

end
else
begin
select
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(day,1,eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1)), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) FROM_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE())), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) TO_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) [CURRENT_DATE],
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()), 'yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) [YEAR],
cast(cast(FORMAT(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()), 'MM') as int) as nvarchar(12)) [MONTH]
end

if  day(dateadd(hour,7,getdate())) >= @{pipeline().parameters.FROM_DATE_PREVIOUS_MONTH} and day(dateadd(hour,7,getdate())) <= @{pipeline().parameters.TO_DATE_PREVIOUS_MONTH}
begin 
select
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(day,1,eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1)), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) FROM_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE())), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) TO_DATE

union all
select
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(day,1,eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-2)), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) FROM_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) TO_DATE

end
else
begin
select
cast(FORMAT(dateadd(day,1,eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE()),-1)), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) FROM_DATE,
cast(FORMAT(eomonth(dateadd(hour,7,GETDATE())), 'MMM dd yyyy') as nvarchar(12)) TO_DATE
end

ifFalseActivities.name: EXECUTE BRAVO SDE FACT CHILD AUTO

pipeline.referenceName: BRAVO SDE FACT CHILD MANUAL TEST
BRAVO SDE FACT CHILD MANUAL TEST

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT [ORDER] FROM [ADF].[ETL_JOB] WHERE job_sub_group = '@{pipeline().parameters.job_sub_group}'
AND CASE WHEN '@{pipeline().parameters.job_id}'= 'ALL' THEN job_id ELSE CAST('@{pipeline().parameters.job_id}' AS BIGINT) END = job_id
AND CASE WHEN '@{pipeline().parameters.job_group}'= 'ALL' THEN job_group ELSE '@{pipeline().parameters.job_group}' END = job_group
AND
case
WHEN
'@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = 'ALL'  THEN '1'
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '01' then [GROUP_01]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '02' then [GROUP_02]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '03' then [GROUP_03]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '04' then [GROUP_04]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '05' then [GROUP_05]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '06' then [GROUP_06]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '07' then [GROUP_07]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '08' then [GROUP_08]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '09' then [GROUP_09]
when '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = '10' then [GROUP_10] END = (CASE WHEN '@{pipeline().parameters.group_number}' = 'ALL'  THEN '1' ELSE '@{pipeline().parameters.group_name}' END)
AND [ACTIVE_FLG] = 'Y'
ORDER BY [ORDER]

select  * from [DWH].[W_D_MA_DVCS] where 1=1
AND CASE WHEN '@{pipeline().parameters.ENTITY}' = 'ALL' THEN [MA_DVCS] ELSE '@{pipeline().parameters.ENTITY}' END = [MA_DVCS]
